attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
RETHINK AND CONSULT THE PUBLIC ABOUT THE INTRODUCTION OF EMERGENCY CARE ASSISTANTS.
AMBULANCES SHOULD BE STAFFED BY QUALIFIED,FULLY TRAINED EMTS & PARAMEDICS.
The goverment is restructuring the Ambulance Service without consulting the public or the operational staff.These changes will result in A&E  Ambulances losing a qualified and trained member of staff.
These will be replaced by a driver trained to drive under emergency conditions,and with basic first aid skills.

(ECA-read as Community Support Officer,EMT-read as Police Constable)

It is being rushed through, with little thought being given to training or the future. 
At present, every Ambulance,(except for trial areas), is staffed by a minimum of 2 Emergency Medical Technicians.

The new role has been introduced through the back door.It is purely a cost cutting exercise.It will not mean more ambulances are available. Paramedics will burn out very quickly,and recruitment/retention will suffer rapidly.And people will die...As a Paramedic you cannot do your job properly without a properly trained colleague.

PLEASE think about what you are doing to our Emergency Services, this will be a massive step backwards.
